ComicInfo.Title: Gotham Must Fall
ComicInfo.Summary: Gotham Must Fall: Damian helps Black Canary, Batgirl, and Harley infiltrate Gotham on their mission to stop Dick, but they are quickly confronted by Punchline, who will only let them through for a price. Oliver attempts to get Hawkman to surrender the human blood farm in Smallville, but when that fails, he works with Grifter and a surprise ally to plan an escape. In Australia, Steel, Supergirl, and Jayna continue to their goal.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-22 20:58:10. [CVDB952219] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 21:48:47. [Issue ID 2444558]
ComicInfo.Writer: James Tynion IV,Matthew Rosenberg,James Tynion IV,Matthew Rosenberg
